RelatedSentence: In America , they have Super Tuesday .
Europe is about to have a Super Sunday ( May 25 ) , with elections   for the European Parliament taking place across the 28 - member EU , ending on May 25 .
That same Sunday ( May 25 ) , Ukraine will be holding a presidential election .
The next day ( May 26 ) , Egypt will hold its own presidential vote .

And then , towards the end of that week , on May 29 , President Vladimir Putin 's pet project - the formation of a Eurasian Union - will receive the formal go - ahead with a signing ceremony between Russia , Belarus and Kazakhstan .
